metadata.title: Enjoy VOLUMIZING ELIXIR, Style (with Sleek Steel Pin Tail Comb) (8.8 oz)
features: includes a Sleek Steel Pin Tail Comb for easy styling and separation of hair!
This formula styles effortlessly, adding density and texture to fine hair. Gives hair incredible body with long lasting hold.
DIRECTIONS FOR USE: On clean damp hair, squeeze a small amount into hands and emulsify
Apply to hair and style as desired.
For maximum volume, be sure to apply to the root of the hair and comb through the ends.
description: includes a Sleek Steel Pin Tail Comb for easy styling and separation of hair!  This formula styles effortlessly, adding density and texture to fine hair.
